title: What happens if I never return a Library book?
content: I issued a text about 2 months back and I keep on forgetting to renew it. What consequences could I face?

comments.body: They will not release your ESA results until you return it
You won't get your hall ticket. Like 3 days before your ESA they'll release one a list if your name is on it,u need to get a no due certificate from the accounts department to get your hall ticket
2 months... U can just go and return the book and pay the fine for it... That's all
Can I keep a textbook the whole sem? There is no limit to renewal right?
